data: Hypersensitivity / Anaphylaxis Treatment (Module)
Medications
Notify Treating Provider
In the event of any suspected hypersensitivity / anaphylaxis, STOP infusion, notify provider STAT
epinephrine 1 mg/mL inj
0.5 mg, IM, once, PRN anaphylaxis, drug form: inj
diphenhydrAMINE
25 mg, PO, once, PRN itching or rash, drug form: cap
50 mg, PO, once, PRN itching or rash, drug form: cap
diphenhydrAMINE
25 mg, IV, once, PRN itching or rash, drug form: inj
50 mg, IV, once, PRN itching or rash, drug form: inj
acetaminophen
650 mg, PO, once, PRN pain-mild or fever, drug form: tab
dimenhyDRINATE PRN range dose
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, PO, once, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
dimenhyDRINATE PRN range dose
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, IV, once, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
hydrocortisone
100 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
200 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
methylPREDNISolone sodium succinate
125 mg, IV, once, PRN allergy symptoms, drug form: inj
famotidine
20 mg, IV, once, PRN itching or rash
salbutamol
5 mg, nebulized, once, PRN shortness of breath or wheezing, drug form: neb
